text: tEShAqmasu#rANAM tiqsraH pura# Asa-nnayaqsma-yya#vaqmA&tha# rajaqtA&thaq hari#NIq tA dEqvA jEtuqM nASa#knuvaqn tA u#paqsadaiqvAji#gIShaqn tasmA#dAhuqryaScaiqvaM ~MvEdaq yaScaq nOpaqsadAq vai ma#hApuqraM ja#yaqntItiq ta iShuq(gm)q sama#skurvatAq- gnimanI#kaq(gm)q sOma(gm)# SaqlyaM ~MviShNuqM tEja#naqM tE$&bruvaqn ka iqmAma#siShyaqtIti#- [  ] 15
